text: Pedreros Jorge Arnaldo Aviles (August 8, 1942 - September 14, 2013) was a Chilean musician, record producer, actor, comedian. He is one of the creators of the iconic comedy show Jappening with Ja. Pedreros was born on August 8, 1942 in Santiago, Chile. He was married to Gladys del RÃ­o from 1967 until his death in 2013. Pedreros died on September 14, 2013 from complications of pneumonia, aged 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Chilean movie actors Category:Chilean television actors Category:Musicians from Santiago Category:Comedians Category:Actors from Santiago Category:Businesspeople from Santiago Category:Record producers
title: Jorge Pedreros
